summary: a nordic companion at your service
descriptionHtml:
updates
--------------------
December, 23 - mod manager support added


description
----------------------------------
you will find him at Dragonsearch as a potential follower (or for marriage..); he will be naked, bring him some nice clothes


Installation
------------------------------------------
chose the version (with or without warpaint) then copy and past the content into your skyrim DATA folder
or
use nexus mod manager


Uninstallation
----------------------------------------------
delete the copied files or uninstall via Mod Manager



to look like the pictures:
--------------------------------------------------
(required) ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0 (28,475kb size)
Standalone 20 New Male hairs - Not included in ApachiiSkyHair v_1_4_Full
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Eye of Beauty NPC eyes texture replacer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Fine Face Textures by Urshi
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Beards by Hvergelmir
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363
author: skyone
